title: New: London Grammar – Feelings
content:
Continuing their rise to fame with recent video release Strong, UK trio London Grammar show yet again why they’re one of the most hotly tipped acts around at the moment in time.

New track, Feelings the flip side to the aforementioned Strong, is a percussion led beauty, almost relying solely on the powerful vocals and tribal-esque drum beat. Check out Feelings below, and keep your ears open for their debut LP If You Wait, out 9 September.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
